detail.content: Drama: Tisch School of the Arts at NYU                           Skip to content        Special Programs What Is Special Programs? Study Abroad Summer High School Summer in New York City Programs for Visiting Students Open Arts Minors Blog Events Newsletters Videos Admin & Faculty Alumni Contact Us  home > Special Programs        Drama  The Department of Drama offers actor-training programs at all levels ranging from the Fundamentals of Acting, Audition Technique, and Voice Lessons to daily intensive study with one of the department's affiliated studios. Practical training is complemented by academic study through the department's highly respected theatre studies program led by theatre scholars, theorists, and historians.    Professional Training Studios       Atlantic Theater Company New Studio on Broadway Lee Strasberg Theatre and Film Institute    Stella Adler Conservatory of Acting    Stonestreet Screen Acting    The Meisner Studio For curriculum or faculty-specific inquiries, please contact Katrina Denney at 212-998-1847 or katrina.denney@nyu.edu .     Summer 2015 Drama Undergraduate Courses                         Back to Summer in NYC Summer in NYC Information  Office of Special Programs 721 Broadway, 12th Floor New York, NY 10003  Contact us!
